title: Dancing On Ice's Vanessa Bauer hints she is in show rehearsals with sexy ice skating routine

Dancing On Ice's Vanessa Bauer has hinted she is already getting ready for the upcoming series of the winter show.

The petite beauty, 23, has been teasing fans on Instagram by sharing footage of her working on a sizzling routine on the ice.

Looking every inch the professional, the figure skater could be seen whizzing about on the frozen flooring clad in sportswear.

Not giving much away, she wrote alongside the footage #PLAYTIME.

In a following clip, she could be seen kicking her leg in the air and swivelling in spirals which she hash tagged "difficult entry."

After her time on the ice Vanessa shared a clip of her cool-down routine as she stripped down to a white sports bra to stretch.

(Image: Instagram)

It is yet to be known which celebrity the beauty will be partnered with when the 2020 series begins in January.

The twelve stars on the line-up have been revealed as a host of big names including TV favourites, reality TV characters and presenters.

On last year's series Vanessa was paired with Love Island hunk Wes Nelson .

Their partnership dominated headlines after Wes' now ex-girlfriend Megan Barton-Hanson grew jealous of Vanessa and Wes' dance partnership which she shared in a public Instagram post.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

Megan caused major ruffled feathers as she hit out at skating pro Vanessa for coinciding the news of her own breakup with Wes' debut dance.

She accused Vanessa of wanting media attention, writing on her Instagram Story: "Love that you decide to announce your breakup with your boyfriend on the night of your 1st performance with my boyfriend!

"You've never reached out to me once or invited me to watch you train, it pained you to introduce yourself to me last night you didn't even look me in the eye LOL."

(Image: Getty)

She added: "Hope the tactical breakup got your the headlines you wanted babe."

Two weeks after the busty blonde and Wes split.

Wes is now dating Arabella Chi who briefly starred on this years Love Island.
description: The professional ice skater has been sharing footage on her social media which suggests she is preparing for the ITV series
